name: Micromax 81cm (32 inch) HD Ready LED TV
content:
Do not go for this product.
I ordered this product on 3rd Jan.
Flipkart delivered this product on time on 7th jan & installed it on same day. 5 star to flip kart on this.
when i started watching i realized that square pixels on the screen, i did tried all settings but its same pixels, and about picture quality its not natural colours over color, reddish, over sturated no setting helped me.

Finally i lost my temper and raised a replacement request on 8th Jan,on 11th jan an engineer from micromax visited my place, i believe he visted my place to report ok i guess without listening to me.

His comments:
1. In a micromax tv square pixels are normal.
2. From a micromax tv you will expect this kind of picture only.
3.My home theatre which is working fine with other appliance is declared faulty by him.

I called Flipkart support to change my replacement to a refund, he said it cannot possible as per policy.

So the conclusion is if you purchase it you will be owning headache, nobody will help you either Flipkart or Micromax.

Flipkart will care about policy, they will not care if a customer is happy or not with the purchase.
really pathetic. READ MORE

But he didn't show the demo and he went out within 5 minutes. Now I have to call up another person to show the functions of the TV. FilpKart have to take actions against this type of service. review title: TV is good but go for 43 inch

TV is good.
If your planing for home then 43 inch recommended.
Sound quality good.
Picture quality is good.
it is read HD that means it render only 720p resolution. If you have 1080 it will display only 720p.
Please go for Full HD 43 inch TV then you will feel full stratification.
USB and HDMI port on the back side of the TV.
If you use wallmount then you can connect USB and HDMI cable easily.
We need to buy the USB/HDMI extender cable. READ MORE

name: Micromax 81cm (32 inch) HD Ready LED TV
review title: OK ok product but a value for money at 11000/-
content:
Pros:
Big size tv
3 years warranty
Plays video from USB

Cons:
Ok ok sound and picture quality.
Not full HD
cant play many video formats.(unable to detect 4k and hd videos in pendrive)


Big issue:
No standard 3.5 mm audio jack.
You will not be able to hear sound or there will be the distortion noise from speakers.
When contacted for this issue I was told the issue is with speaker, which is not true(checked with atleast 5 other devices).
My conclusion the 3.5 mm head phone jack is not standard.
You can use the speakers with audio cables i.e. red and yellow pins.

Will be a issue if you plan on using external speakers. otherwise you need not worry. READ MORE

name: Micromax 81cm (32 inch) HD Ready LED TV
content:
Nice TV in this price.
Things to remember:
1. If you buy it with exchange, if your old TV show any problem on time of exchange, they won't take it and your order will be cancelled. You can't pay extra and keep the delivery.
2. If you pay using phone pay, even though it is debited from your account, in case you opt for cancellation/return you'll get your money into phone pay wallet. So you're bound to buy something worth thousands of rupees!
3. If you're going for a sale/offer, go for initial days, in case you mesh up, you can still cancel and reapply for offer.
4. Some times the deliveryman opens and shows the TV to confirm safe delivery sometimes he won't! Ideally he should. As if the TV is found damaged during installation it might be considered as damage was done between delivery and installation.
5. While using USB to play movie, if you want to go to a particular time slot in that movie/video you have to fast forward it all the way to that spot. READ MORE

name: Micromax 81cm (32 inch) HD Ready LED TV
content:
i got the same product 32T8361HD but the back side if TV is not as shown in Flipkart.

If we Look from back side all the ports are at left side. In Flipkart, its showing ports are at right and bottom side it is not correct.

Ports in order
2 usb
Vga
HDMI 2
HDMI 1
AV in 2
AV in 1
Antenna in
AV out

All AV ports are AV audio + video mini socket. micromax is providing one RCA to 3.5 mm converter. If we want to use other 2 AV ports we have to buy converter (3.5 mm Male Jack To 3 RCA Female Plug Adapter Audio Converter Video AV Cable Wire Cord )

No separate 3.5 mm audio out

Clarity depends on the input given.. READ MORE
